name: PooShooter: Toilet Invaders
description: Pooshooter: Toilet Invaders is a 2D action comedy game packed with explosions and fun gameplay. Reminiscent of arcade classics like Space Invaders, PooShooter lets you take control of a Bum fighting against vengeful Toilets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: s h i t t y game xDD sorry but i cant resist to write,btw if the DEV add some achievements the game is not so sh.. bad :)
